home_title: Custom digital solutions for your business
home_description: Creation of websites, bots, and systems with agility and style.
servicos_titulo: What I can develop for you
servico_1_desc: Creation of landing pages and modern business websites, with responsive design and WhatsApp button. Perfect for freelancers, small businesses and affiliates.
servico_2_desc: Automate support, send catalogs, collect leads or information with smart bots. Fast integrations with practical tools.
servico_3_desc: Custom systems with login, customer control, inventory or orders.
about_texto: MaiCode was created to deliver fast, modern and affordable digital solutions. We turn ideas into products ready for your audience.
